p.quote: "St.Patrick was a useful Saint he frightenend all the snakes away- I wish he'd try his art on smoke around the Hammermill some day!"

sourceDesc.p: The passage is written in black pen while there is note at the bottom of the paper that is in red pen ink.

body.p: All across the page there is three leaf clovers and two snakes drawn in. The bottom right corner of the paper features a factory of some sorts that might be the hammerhill.
